message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate the value of the product, $90 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with right now.  I'm willing to pay $85.  Let me know what you think.

Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand that $85 is a bit lower than what I was hoping for, but I'm willing to compromise. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $87.50. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in.
